welcometext.transText:
This is a bulk document collection and download system. Browse, select documents and they will be added to your submittal package.

All Results: Use the filter navigation to the left to find documents for the B-Line product line.

View Submittal Package: Once you have collected all the documents you want or reach 100mb, go to “view submittal package” tab to review and edit your documents.

Download Package: Select this tab when you are ready to download your documents.

Contact: Blineus@Eaton.com if you have any issues with using the Submittal Builder.
